content.question: Capture and paste a procedure from your program that you developed during the administration of this task that implements an algorithm used in your program. This procedure must contain and use one or more parameters that have an effect on the functionality of the procedure.

frqParts.text: Capture and paste a procedure from your program that you developed during the administration of this task that implements an algorithm used in your program. This procedure must contain and use one or more parameters that have an effect on the functionality of the procedure.

Provide a written response that: (Approx. 200 words, exclusive of program code) describes two calls to the selected procedure, where each call passes different arguments that cause a different segment of code in the algorithm to execute,
describes what condition(s) is being tested by each call to the procedure, and
identifies the result of each call.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and correct errors in algorithms and programs, including error discovery through testing.
